short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple calculator extension for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Product Description:

"Simple Calculator" is a lightweight, minimalist calculator extension for Chrome that provides quick, basic calculations right in your browser. Designed with a clean interface and essential features, this calculator is ideal for users looking for a straightforward, no-frills tool to perform everyday calculations.

Why Install:

• Minimalistic Design: A clean, clutter-free interface ensures you focus only on your calculations.
Effortless Calculations: Easily accessible from your browser's toolbar for quick, on-the-go calculations.

• Keyboard Compatibility: Includes convenient keyboard support, allowing you to type calculations without needing to click buttons.

• Lightweight and Fast: Built to perform quickly, without using extra resources.
Perfect for anyone seeking an easy-to-use calculator without unnecessary features.
